title: Tommy Green from Sleeping Giant
itunes:title: Tommy Green from Sleeping Giant
description:
While his band was recording in Southern California, I was afforded an opportunity to speak to Tommy Green who is the vocalist for a metal/hardcore band called Sleeping Giant. We spoke about religion, acting awful and confrontation. It's an open and honest discussion that anyone can identify with and I encourage you to check it out. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
